TopicTitle: Bagel Rabbit: The Future of KSP Insanity!

Articles.Content:
Hello once again, Individuals, and welcome to another episode of the Kerbal Space Program! (I say that at the beginning of all of my videos.)

Alright, here's a brief synopsis of my YouTube channel, Bagel Rabbit.

It's rather unique! The channel features genuine, unscripted KSP adventures that usually end up rather better than expected.

It features quality designs! I like building small planes. And VTOLs. And rovers. And spacecraft. And craft that, quite honestly, aren't any of those things, like flying rovers and tank-aircraft. Oh, and every once in a while, I find a bug with the game and love it to death. Long live the floaty fuel-tank! Yay!

It's rather popular! Almost 450 people have subscribed to Bagel Rabbit, including some big names like Wookiee and Andrew Hansen.

It is like a shot of caffeine to the face! When in doubt, add more enthusiasm. (I get most of my energy from caffeinated tea, and from watching past episodes of my videos.)

So!

I'm not going to post all 180-ish videos that I have made, but I will post the last three. They will give you a good indication of my channel's epic-osity. I'm currently in the middle of discovering what I can do with the Floaty-Fuel-Tank bug found in Video 2, but I will resume my normal KSP videos once that is done.

Here ya go!

Let me know what you think, and be sure to leave a like if you enjoy what you see. And, if you feel warm and fuzzy inside, you could give me some +Rep. (But you don't have to.)

Well, that's it for now!

Have a very nice day, Individuals! Like, Favorite, Subscribe and Share, please, and I'll see you next time with another episode of the Kerbal Space Program! PEACE!!

Edited June 16, 2014 by UpsilonAerospace

Hello once again, Individuals!

Two days after I made this thread, I forgot that it existed, so there's a new video up!

In this video, I continue my construction of tiny VTOLs with an (admittedly somewhat poor) design! But that wasn't the real point of the video.

I want to hear what y'all want me to do with this channel. Should I make the videos longer? Add more text? Study bugs, continue making VTOLs, or construct large and grand ships?

Incidentally, my feedback on my YouTube channel suggests that VTOLs are cool, but making larger-scale craft and/or military craft and/or observing more bugs would be nice. I'll give you the suggestions that made the cut... in the next video!

Your opinion is appreciated (gib suggestion pls )

Hey I found you Bagel Rabbit, I knew that you were posting your videos on a forum !

Haha xD

Nice job, like a boss
